title: (x) beautiful sans w/ big ink traps from a Ray Gun spread - Eunuverse {Patricking}
content:
Hi,

I’ve been searching for this type for a long time.

I saw it from a Raygun magazine.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081203170716im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/y_5105.jpg)

 [‹ (x) wide slab on Pink Floyd "A Saucerful of Secrets" album cover - Volta {Loremipsum}](http://web.archive.org/web/20081203170716/http:/www.typophile.com/node/38544 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) Phillips 66 logo - custom {Richard Hards} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081203170716/http:/www.typophile.com/node/38017 "Go to next forum topic")
author: ericquenneville

comments.content: Many of the Raygun fonts were designed specifically for the magazine, but some were released in the retail market as [GarageFonts](http://web.archive.org/web/20081203170716/http:/www.typophile.com/wiki/GarageFonts).

thanks, I’m gonna take a look at the site.

good day
